alert.note: Alert for La Salle (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 24 at 11:14PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern La Salle County through 1145 PM CDT... At 1113 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fort Ewell Site, or 15 miles northeast of Encinal, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fort Ewell Site and Artesia Wells. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 51 and 56. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
